meaningMnemonic: Use <kanji>attire</kanji> that <kanji>imitate</kanji>s your surroundings to create a <vocabulary>disguise</vocabulary>. Or throw on some <vocabulary>camouflage</vocabulary> so that no one will be able to find you in Walmart.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
